document.full_text: the sponsor of a bill that would make missouri a "right-to-work" state said on tuesday she'll keep pushing the bill forward later this month -- despite the threat of a possible veto by governor jay nixon.
document.title: missouri "right-to-work" bill pushed in state senate
lines_and_colors: the sponsor of a bill that would make missouri a "right-to-work" state said on tuesday she'll keep pushing the bill forward later this month -- despite the threat of a possible veto by governor jay nixon.
